archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Implement Product Portfolio Management Functions
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Process Context This process element represents part of the overall enterprise, modelled in business process terms, and can be applied (i.e. â€œinstantiated") with other similar process elements for application within a specific organization or domain. Brief Description Implement cross-portfolio and cross-product co-ordination Extended Description Implement product portfolio management functions processes focus on agreement on and implementation of cross-portfolio and cross-product co-ordination and, management functions. Explanatory Reserved for future use. Mandatory Reserved for future use.
